title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 5.25 - General inmate records and data
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 5.25 - General inmate records and data

State Regulations

All other inmate records and data shall only be released in
the discretion of the commissioner or his designee for a proper purpose, giving
consideration to the privacy of the inmate, the security of facilities and
departmental operations and the public safety. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7
ยง
5.25

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
